001package org.nasdanika.ncore.util;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.Collection;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.HashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Objects;
009
010import org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI;
011import org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject;
012import org.json.JSONArray;
013import org.json.JSONObject;
014
015/**
016 * This class shall not be used with {@link HashMap} because two identities may be equal but have different hash codes. Use {@link SemanticMap} instead.
017 * @author Pavel
018 *
019 */
020public class SemanticIdentityImpl implements SemanticIdentity {
021        
022        public static String IDENTIFIERS_KEY = "identifiers";
023        
024        protected Collection<URI> identifiers;
025        
026        public SemanticIdentityImpl(Collection<URI> identifiers) {
027                if (identifiers != null) {
028                        this.identifiers = Collections.unmodifiableList(new ArrayList<>(identifiers));
029                } else {
030                        this.identifiers = Collections.emptyList();
031                }
032        }
033        
034        public SemanticIdentityImpl(EObject semanticElement) {
035                List<URI> semanticURIs = new ArrayList<>();
036                for (URI uri: NcoreUtil.getIdentifiers(semanticElement)) {
037                        if (!uri.isRelative()) {
038                                semanticURIs.add(uri);
039                        }
040                }
041                this.identifiers = Collections.unmodifiableList(semanticURIs);
042        }
043        
044        public JSONObject toJSON() {
045                JSONObject ret = new JSONObject();
046                if (!getIdentifiers().isEmpty()) {
047                        JSONArray jIdentifiers = new JSONArray();
048                        for (URI identifier: getIdentifiers()) {
049                                jIdentifiers.put(identifier.toString());
050                        }
051                        ret.put(IDENTIFIERS_KEY, jIdentifiers);
052                }
053                
054                return ret;
055        }
056        
057        public SemanticIdentityImpl(JSONObject jsonObj) {
058                if (jsonObj.has(IDENTIFIERS_KEY)) {
059                        JSONArray jIdentifiers = jsonObj.getJSONArray(IDENTIFIERS_KEY);
060                        ArrayList<URI> aIdentifiers = new ArrayList<>();
061                        for (Object el: jIdentifiers) {
062                                aIdentifiers.add(URI.createURI((String) el));
063                        }
064                        identifiers = Collections.unmodifiableList(aIdentifiers);
065                } else {
066                        identifiers = Collections.emptyList();
067                }
068        }
069                
070        @Override
071        public Collection<URI> getIdentifiers() {
072                return identifiers;
073        }
074
075        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
076                if (this == obj) {
077                        return true;
078                }
079                if (obj instanceof SemanticIdentity) {
080                        SemanticIdentity other = (SemanticIdentity) obj;
081                        Collection<URI> thisIdentifiers = getIdentifiers();
082                        if (thisIdentifiers != null && !thisIdentifiers.isEmpty()) {            
083                                Collection<URI> otherIdentifiers = other.getIdentifiers();
084                                if (otherIdentifiers != null && !otherIdentifiers.isEmpty()) {                                  
085                                        for (URI thisIdentifier: getIdentifiers()) {
086                                                if (otherIdentifiers.contains(thisIdentifier)) {
087                                                        return true;
088                                                }
089                                        }
090                                }
091                        }
092                }
093                return false;
094        }
095        
096        public int hashCode() {
097                return Objects.hash(getIdentifiers());
098        }       
099        
100}
